title: California Roll
description: Crab, avocado, and cucumber rolled with seaweed and sushi rice, served with soy sauce and wasabi.

title: Salmon Nigiri
description: Sliced raw salmon over pressed sushi rice, served with soy sauce and wasabi.

title: Tuna Sashimi
description: Fresh slices of raw tuna, served with soy sauce and pickled ginger.

title: Spicy Tuna Roll
description: Tuna mixed with spicy mayo, rolled with seaweed and sushi rice, served with soy sauce and wasabi.

title: Shrimp Tempura Roll
description: Crispy shrimp tempura, avocado, and cucumber rolled with seaweed and sushi rice, served with soy sauce and wasabi.

title: Dragon Roll
description: Eel, avocado, and cucumber rolled with seaweed and sushi rice, topped with sliced avocado and eel sauce.

title: Vegetable Roll
description: Assorted fresh vegetables rolled with seaweed and sushi rice, served with soy sauce and wasabi.

title: Philadelphia Roll
description: Smoked salmon, cream cheese, and cucumber rolled with seaweed and sushi rice, served with soy sauce and wasabi.
